name: BEATS by Dreamer
description:
The Light Invaders are coming, and there's only one way to power our turrets. With some sick beats! Some idiot melded the cannon control panel with his sound board, but I'm not complaining.

The cannons fire on their own, but you can augment their power with beats. Rearrange your beats on the sound board by clicking on the squares. As you defeat more enemies you can uncover more beats.

A tower defense rhythm game. Submitted for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop. This submission is very unfinished.

Heavily inspired by a rougelike shooter that also used this system of attacking. If you know it, please comment it! I'd really love to find it again.

Arts and Assets made entirely by me.

Programs used: Godot, Inkscape and Audacity.
